snippet: Lieutenant Lawrence J. Franks Jr. was sentenced to four years in prison and dismissed from the Army after he was accused of enlisting in the French Foreign Legion.
abstract: Second Lt Lawrence J Franks Jr from Fort Drum, NY, is sentenced to four years in prison and dismissal from Army on charges of conduct unbecoming of an officer and desertion with intention to shirk duty; he had enlisted in French Foreign Legion after suffering from suicidal urges.
lead_paragraph: Lieutenant Lawrence J. Franks Jr. was sentenced to four years in prison and dismissed from the Army after he was accused of enlisting in the French Foreign Legion.

headline.main: Army Deserter Is Jailed for Chasing the Conflicts That Steadied His Mind
headline.print_headline: Army Deserter Is Jailed for Chasing the Conflicts That Steadied His Mind

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
